Installation and Setup

Rover is simply a Node.js project. If you have worked with ApolloTV Claws, you may notice that the installation and setup steps are also relatively similar.

  1. Install and (usually included with nodejs).
  2. Install the project dependencies, as per any Node.js project. 
     $ npm install
  3. Copy the example configuration and then edit the file if necessary. 
    $ cp config/config.dist.ts config/config.ts

    On Windows, youâ€™ll need to use copy instead of cp.

  4. Profit!

Configuration

Rover is maintained by ApolloTVofficial. If you've spotted a mistake or would like to add to the documentation, you can submit a pull request.
